title: Goliath Frog
desc:
Post 3124
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The Goliath Frog, the largest known frog species, likely grew from pushing rocks. It may select a player to gather rocks around that player's house, preventing them from leaving their house.
Attributes -
- The Goliath Frog uses rocks from nearby a player's house. The second time they target the same player, the effect will take place the next night instead.
- The Goliath Frog is roleblock immune.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
